mapper.select: /* intrScheInqy10101010 : 일정 목록 조회 */ SELECT APRV.APRV_IDX , APRV.CURR_APRV_SNO , APRV.EMP_IDX , DEPT.DEPT_CD , '[연차] '||DEPT.DEPT_NM||' '||EMP.EMP_NM AS "TITLE" , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(APRV.EFCT_SDT,'YYYY-MM-DD'), 'YYYY-MM-DD') || ' 00:00:00' AS "START" , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(APRV.EFCT_EDT,'YYYY-MM-DD'), 'YYYY-MM-DD') || ' 24:00:00' AS "END" , APRV.USE_YN , APRV.DISP_ORDER , APRV.REMARK FROM INTR_APRV APRV INNER JOIN INTR_APRV_LINE LINE ON LINE.APRV_IDX = APRV.APRV_IDX AND LINE.LAST_APRV_YN = 'Y' AND LINE.APRV_RSLT_DT IS NOT NULL AND TEMPLATE_CD = 'TEMP_0001' LEFT OUTER JOIN INTR_EMP EMP ON EMP.EMP_IDX = APRV.EMP_IDX LEFT OUTER JOIN INTR_DEPT DEPT ON DEPT.DEPT_CD = EMP.DEPT_CD
